MS MCQs

    Learn the AL statements in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. If you want to use a single-line comment to comment on a single line of code, what should you use?

      Put forward slashes (//) on the end of the comment line.

      Put forward slashes (//) at the beginning of a line of code.

      Put backward slashes () at the beginning of a line of code.

      Put forward slashes (//) at the beginning of a line of code and backward slashes () at the end of the comment line.


    2. Which repetitive statement enables you to repeat one or more statements a known number of times?

      While

      For

      Repeat until

      Loop


    3. Which repetitive statement does not require a begin and end block to run more than one statement repetitively?

      Repeat-until

      For-to-do

      While-do

      Foreach-in-do


    4. Which repetitive statement runs code at least once before validating a condition?

      For-downto-do

      While-do

      Repeat-until

      For-to-do
